main event: A bright white, glowing round object was observed oscillating in a vertical direction at high speed near Randolph AFB, Texas, on December 3, 1960.
interesting points: The object was detected on radar and visually observed by both airborne and ground personnel., The object traveled in a southerly direction for about 1-1/2 minutes., It was reported bright white and round in shape., The object was seen oscillating at a high rate of speed., Witnesses described the object disappearing before any further actions could be taken.
